nodes.text: The Old Mine was a ten kilometer by six kilometer cavern located a kilometer under the surface of the moon Trilos. It was located one hundred and twenty kilometers away from New Atraken City and was connected via a double-tracked subway. The Old Mine was the first mine established on Trilos, and after being played out, the cavern was home to the Atrakenite's large manufacturing equipment. A community of 10,000 also resided in the Old Mine by 6 ABY, served by a single cantina also called the "Old Mine."
